snippet.title: Nightmare Side: The Game - Full Release Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Unravel Indonesian horrors set in an actual radio station. Don't listen to Nightmare Side alone, or you'll invite the darkness.

The game has undergone an overhaul compared to the Early Access version, with approximately 75% new content, including new story elements and mechanics.

Nightmare Side: The Game is available on Steam.

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2649780/Nightmare_Side_The_Game/
